bot.name: Cognitum
bot.description: This is a small Discord bot with statistics collection and useful utility features made by The Core Community.

help.title: Help
help.description: Lists all available commands and usage examples for them.

prefix.title: Change prefix
prefix.description: Command for setting up custom prefix.

changed.title: Prefix changed!
changed.description: Prefix for current guild successfully changed to `%prefix%`!
changed.descriptionDefault: Prefix for current guild successfully reset to default. Now it's `%prefix%`.

default.title: An error has occurred!
default.description: An unexpected error has occurred! Try again later or notify us about this problem at [our Discord guild](https://discord.gg/SbNZQMV) or [GitHub repository](https://github.com/thecorecity/cognitum/issues/new).

commandNotFound.title: Command `%commandName%` not found!
commandNotFound.description: Requested command not found! Try to enter `%prefix%help` to get a complete list of commands.
